QXJ0aWNsZTpueXQ6Ly9hcnRpY2xlLzBhOTc5OTVm.title: Snowmobiles in Slush: Sports Are on Thin Ice in the Warming Arctic

QXJ0aWNsZTpueXQ6Ly9hcnRpY2xlLzJhNWZhNGNi.summary: The three referees and three assistant referees are the first to be picked for the top men’s soccer tournament, which will be held in Qatar this year.

QXJ0aWNsZTpueXQ6Ly9hcnRpY2xlLzg2MGRmYWVk.summary: Wiggins, the No. 1 overall draft pick in 2014, had developed a reputation as a bust. Coming to Golden State has helped him finally tap his potential.

QXJ0aWNsZTpueXQ6Ly9hcnRpY2xlLzA5ZmMwNTBi.summary: And why not? After a couple of years of uncharacteristically mediocre play, he sees an opportunity at the P.G.A. Championship to complete a career Grand Slam.

QXJ0aWNsZTpueXQ6Ly9hcnRpY2xlLzg0NmYwNDYw.summary: Scherzer will get an M.R.I. after the Mets beat St. Louis. The Yankees, meanwhile, beat Baltimore with baserunning and defense.

QXJ0aWNsZTpueXQ6Ly9hcnRpY2xlLzcxZDkyM2E2.summary: When Glasgow Rangers and Eintracht Frankfurt headed to Spain for the Europa League final, tens of thousands of their fans followed.

QXJ0aWNsZTpueXQ6Ly9hcnRpY2xlLzlhZTNiZTFh.summary: Tucker did a little bit of everything in a Game 1 win over the Boston Celtics in the Eastern Conference finals — including help neutralize Jayson Tatum.
